abstract: Presents a popover tip on the modified view.

declaration.code: @preconcurrency nonisolated func popoverTip(_ tip: (any Tip)?, isPresented: Binding<Bool>? = nil, attachmentAnchor: PopoverAttachmentAnchor = .rect(.bounds), arrowEdge: Edge? = nil, action: @escaping @MainActor (Tips.Action) -> Void = { _ in }) -> some View

overview:
### Discussion

Use this modifier to present a tip as a popover on an existing view when the tip becomes eligible for display.
title: popoverTip(_:isPresented:attachmentAnchor:arrowEdge:action:)
